category: Management group operation regulations/Article 6 (Establishment of management committee)
contents: Article 6 (Establishment of Management Committee) ① The Sports Association may establish and operate a Management Committee (hereinafter referred to as *Committee) to take charge of the affairs of member organizations designated as management organizations. Revised on October 6, 2021. ② The committee shall consist of not less than 5 but not more than 9 members, including the chairperson and vice-chairperson. Revised on April 3, 2017, October 6, 2021. ③ The chairperson, vice-chairman and members are recommended by the President of the Korea Sports Council and are appointed with the consent of the Board of Directors. Revised on October 6, 2021. ④ The committee shall have one secretary, who shall be appointed by the President of the Korea Sports Council from among the Sports Council staff. Revised 2021. 10. 6.
